item.title: AZ-104: Azure Certified Administrator: Renewal
item.description: I recently renewed my Azure Administrator Associate certification via the MS Learn online assessment. Visit here to find out more about the Microsoft Certification renewal process. Learning Resources Although I originally passed the AZ-103, here are the equivalent 104 resources I used the first time round to help me prepare for the exam. A Cloud Guru - AZ-104 Certification Prep MS Learn - AZ-104 Learning Path MS Learn - AZ-104 Labs Microsoft Press - AZ-104 Exam Ref The Renewal Experience The following points may be handy to know when preparing for the assessment.
